newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: UOP aims to maintain 10-pct growth in 1997.
newsitem.headline: UOP aims to maintain 10-pct growth in 1997.

text.p: UOP, a partnership between Allied Signal Inc and Union Carbide Corp, is hoping to maintain its revenue growth of 10 percent in 1997, a senior company official said on Friday.
"We have been growing at better than 10 percent as a company...(we) want to keep that growth on track," Richard Wilmoth, UOP's managing director in Asia said at the opening of its Singapore office.
UOP, a supplier and licenser of technologies to oil and gas related industries saw 1996 revenues of over U.S.$1 billion.
The company said the Asia-Pacific region which contributes around half of its revenue will be the big growth area.
